name: In Search of the Fluffy Panda of Wisdom
name_original: In Search of the Fluffy Panda of Wisdom
description:
A short space adventure wisdom game made in Bitsy and a couple of Bitsy Hacks. (Made for A Bitsy Family Jam)

Source for Quotes: 50 Wise Quotes That Will Inspire You to Success in Life. Peter Economy, The Leadership Guy.  Inc.com. Accessed June 8, 2020.

Original source for background images: Pixabay converted with Image to Bitsy.
